text: Barack and Michelle Obama have once again shown they are living their best life, with footage emerging of the pair dancing at a Beyonce and Jay - Z concert. Fans of the former president and first lady posted videos of the pair enjoying themselves on Instagram, with one social media user describing the moment she saw the former first couple as “ the highlight of my life. ” Reuters “ The HIGHLIGHT of my life. I saw my idols @ barackobama and @ michelleobama be normal and jam out to @ beyonce and Jay - z, ” she wrote, posting footage of the pair dancing in what appeared to be a private box. From the looks of the footage, all eyes were on Barack and Michelle, with numerous camera phones pointed at the pair to get a snap
